text: Hey guys. A good friend of mine completed/passed the "CMS for marketers" certification but she don't get the "certificate". She sees "almost! you've got 56 of 60 points but you need at least 45 points". She told me that she got every course and everything is checked. Seems like a bug to me :) and since she don't have slack: I've got her mail and HubID (if needed) can some academy master help her please
I gotcha.  DM me the info and I will get the correct eyes on it
